title: 一冊でわかるロシア史
author: 関 眞興
description: ヒゲ税 was interesting.

title: 銀河英雄伝説５　風雲篇
author: 田中芳樹
description: Been almost a year since reading the last one. As always, quite good.

title: 道は開ける
author: Ｄ・カーネギー
description: Really a good book. Much of what is said would fall under "common sense", however the telling of it really influenced myself. I particularly liked the quote: 「過去と未来を鉄の扉で閉ざせ、今日の区切りで生きよう。」. Totally worth the 300 yen at BookOff!

title: MONSTER
author: 浦沢 直樹
description: Page count is a guess. Each volume is probably 200 pages, but keep in mind its manga so it reads quick. MONSTER is truly a masterpiece.

title: ぼくのマンガ人生
author: 手塚 治虫
description: Tetsukawa is a manga genius, and this auto-biography-type book is quite interesting. ミッキーマウス・ディズニーからの影響、そして「子供=新人類」の話も興味深かったです。「命の尊厳」が彼の主なテーマだったのも面白かったです。正直彼の漫画を読んだことがありませんが、彼自身にすごく興味があったわけで、手に取って読んでみようと思ってました。

title: なぜ働いていると本が読めなくなるのか
author: 三宅香帆
description: Pretty interesting read. Is more a history of the culture of reading books, and how it changed over time.

title: ユダヤ式交渉術 どんな相手でも必ず成功を勝ち取れる
author: 矢部 正秋
description: Quite inspirational. I never thought about how the history of the Jewish people would impact the prominence of great Jewish negotiators. Short but insightful read. Great steal at BookOff (~350 yen)!

title: アンドロイドは電気羊の夢を見るか?
author: フィリップ・K・ディック
description: I thought that the book was quite good from the beginning to the middle, and towards the end it kinda fell apart. I would have liked to see a more nuanced view of androids. While Rachael did provide such a role, I would have liked to see some more from Roy. The empathy box / Mercerism was interesting / something I could imagine in such a society. Overall, many interesting ideas were presented, but I would have liked to see some more nuances.

title: 金閣寺
author: 三島 由紀夫
description: I forgot how depressing this book can be. However, it is a masterpiece.

title: 銀河帝国の興亡 3【新訳版】: 回天編
author: アイザック・アシモフ
description: I did not really fancy this one. 第二ファウンデーション was not as interesting to me, and I thought the quest for their location was a bit drawn out and didn't really make much sense to me. Why do they need to attack them in the first place? Maybe I am missing something here.

title: 銀河帝国の興亡2【新訳版】: 怒濤編
author: アイザック・アシモフ
description: The two most interesting parts to me were the use of a musical instrument whose frequencies can activate some neural pathways of your brain, and the fact that ハリ・セルダン's prediction was off slightly.

title: 銀河帝国の興亡1【新訳版】: 風雲編
author: アイザック・アシモフ
description: 心理歴史学 was very interesting. The comparison of making predictions about Brownian motion to that of the motion of large human populations/societies was fascinating, and something I could see happening.

title: 銀河英雄伝説４　策謀篇
author: 田中芳樹
description: Not sure if in this specific book, but I particularly liked the quote 「国家というのは、下から腐るものではなく、上から腐るものなんだ」, or something like that.

title: 宇宙が始まる前には何があったのか?
author: ローレンス・クラウス
description: It seems like the universe will expand faster and faster.

title: 若きサムライのために
author: 三島由紀夫
description: Collection of essays / interviews with Mishima. I think some of these essays / interviews were right before he did 自決. His お茶漬ナショナリズム discussion was interesting.

title: 世界はラテン語でできている
author: ラテン語さん
description: Basically just a bunch of うんちく. Good for random facts.

title: 銀河英雄伝説３　雌伏篇
author: 田中芳樹
description: The 査問会 section was the most interesting. Yan's rebuttal to 自由惑星同盟's government officials claims was quite interesting.

title: グラスホッパー
author: 伊坂 幸太郎
description: 鯨 was my favorite character. Mainly just an entertainment story.

title: 銀河英雄伝説２　野望篇
author: 田中芳樹
description: Using simple tools can beat powerful, but mismanaged ones.

title: 台湾の歴史と文化-六つの時代が織りなす
author: 大東 和重
description: Taiwan's history and culture. Told more like a story than a textbook.

title: 深層学習 改訂第2版
author: 岡谷 貴之
description: Easy to begin introduction. I thought that it was a little less rigorous, and more of an overview of the topic. Next will be the Goodfellow/Bengio/Courville book.

title: マリアビートル
author: 伊坂 幸太郎
description: Book that inspired Bullet Train. Mainly just entertainment.

title: 日本語を遡る
author: 大野 晋
description: History of Japanese. The discussion of 大和言葉 and their relation to modern Japanese was insightful.

title: 現代語訳 老子
author: 保立 道久
description: Taoism by Laozi.

title: 銀河英雄伝説 1 黎明編
author: 田中芳樹
description: Politics and war in space.

title: 三体
author: 劉 慈欣
description: Contact with aliens who live on a planet with three suns. China's cultural revolution also plays in.

title: アルケミスト
author: パウロ・コエーリョ
description: Young shepherd finds meaning.

title: 暁の寺
author: 三島由紀夫
description: Lawyer goes to Thailand, thinks princess is reincarnation of his old friend.

title: ハーモニー
author: 伊藤 計劃
description: In a world without pain, some people want pain.

title: 老人と海
author: ヘミングウェイ
description: Old man goes to fish.

title: 白夜行
author: 東野 圭吾
description: A death from years ago brings people together; criminal is found.

title: 虐殺器官
author: 伊藤 計劃
description: Linguist makes people crazy.
